meta.title: Turnkey websites for business, startups and MVPs — BitAlexis
meta.description: We create turnkey websites: corporate, online stores, landing pages, MVPs and other business solutions. Full development cycle — from idea to launch and customer support in Ukraine, Europe and the USA.

mainTitle: Web development, where the future of your business begins
mainSubTitle: We will find the optimal solution for your business
serviceText_1: We develop websites of any complexity: from landing pages to corporate portals, adapted to business tasks
serviceText_2: We create (MVP) for startups — quickly, efficiently and taking into account priority functionality
serviceText_3: We design and implement eCommerce solutions with a convenient shopping cart, filters, payment and mobile adaptation
serviceText_4: We improve website positions in search engines: speed, structure, content and technical SEO setup
serviceText_5: We provide regular updates, monitoring, backup, edits and technical assistance
serviceText_6: We create a clear and attractive interface: prototypes, design layouts and adaptation for all devices
advantageText_1: Each project is unique. We select solutions for the specific goals of your business
advantageTitle_2: Design with an emphasis on the result
advantageText_2: We create not just beautifully, but effectively: so that the site sells, attracts and is remembered
advantageText_3: A clear plan, understandable stages and adherence to deadlines - we value your time
advantageText_4: We easily adapt to changes, offer ideas and are always on connections
advantageText_5: Experience in WordPress, eCommerce, UX/UI and SEO allows us to create high-quality turnkey solutions
advantageText_6: We don't disappear after the project is delivered — we support, develop and help you grow
consultTitle: Leave a request and we will create the website of your dreams
serviceText: We will create a website or web application for you — from a landing page to an online store, and also provide design, promotion and support services. You can familiarize yourself with our basic services and leave a request with the option you need
serviceCardText_1: A modern landing page or business card site for presenting a business and attracting clients.
serviceCardText_2: A convenient site for articles, portfolio or services - a solution for companies and specialists.
serviceCardText_3: Online store on a popular platform or custom development for online sales.
serviceCardText_4: Stylish and convenient layouts that emphasize the brand and hold attention.
serviceCardText_5: SEO and promotion strategy for traffic, requests and sales growth.
serviceCardText_6: Technical support, updates and website protection.
questionText: If you have any questions or would like to get advice, leave your details in the form. We will be happy to contact you
lineText: We will help you solve your problem!
formMessageSuccess: ✅ Your request has been successfully sent. Thank you for contacting us!
formMessageErrorSend: ❌ An error occurred while sending the form. Please try again later.
formMessageErrorServer: ⚠️ The server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
